Introduction
This topic contains information on taking award action to withhold compensation, including
determining the appropriate effective date for commencing the recoupment of separation benefits
instructions for preparing an award that withholds compensation to recoup separation benefits
, and
preparing a decision notice after commencing the recoupment of separation benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 2 - Recoupment of Separation Benefits
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section None
